arts.ttl: Three talking points ahead of Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid | La Liga MD2
arts.sum: A first away game of the season awaits Real Madrid tomorrow night as they take on Real Oviedo, one of the newly promoted teams in La Liga. The game will take place at Carlos Tartiere Stadium, a venue where Real Madrid last played in 2001. arts.ttl: Real Madrid without four players for La Liga battle with Real Oviedo
arts.sum: Real Madrid will be missing four players through injury for Sunday's La Liga game against Real Oviedo.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid in La Liga
arts.sum: Head coach Xabi Alonso spoke to the media ahead of the game, and was asked about Vinicius Jr., Franco Mastantuono, Santi Cazorla, and other game-related questions. Alonso: We haven't been able to work too hard yet, but there are players who have a lot of quality.

arts.ttl: Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid: Predicted Lineup for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid are back in La Liga action, as they take on Real Oviedo in the first away game of the season. Xabi Alonso started three of his new signings in the game against Osausna, all of them in a back four.
